transcription.text: A look at the life of the astronaut, Neil Armstrong, and the legendary space mission that led him to become the first man to walk on the Moon on July 20, 1969.

work.title: First Man
work.creator_credit: James R. Hansen, Damien Chazelle, Marty Bowen, Ryan Gosling, Wyck Godfrey, Amblin Entertainment, DreamWorks Pictures, Phantasma Films, Temple Hill Entertainment, Universal Pictures and Ian Hunter
